name: New Product Launch Request
description: Submit a request to launch a new product across LuxuryCorp's brand portfolio, including fashion, leather goods, perfumery, cosmetics, watches, jewelry, and wines and spirits.

name: Brand Ambassador Partnership Request
description: Request a partnership with a celebrity or influencer to promote LuxuryCorp's brands, including Louis Vuitton, Christian Dior, and Givenchy.

name: Exclusive Event Hosting Request
description: Submit a request to host an exclusive event at one of LuxuryCorp's flagship stores or private venues, featuring LuxuryCorp's luxury goods and services.

name: Customized Product Order Request
description: Request a customized product order for a special occasion or bespoke gift, featuring LuxuryCorp's high-end materials and craftsmanship.

name: Supply Chain Optimization Request
description: Submit a request to optimize LuxuryCorp's supply chain operations, including logistics, inventory management, and distribution across 70+ countries.

name: Digital Marketing Campaign Request
description: Request a digital marketing campaign to promote LuxuryCorp's brands and products across social media, email, and online advertising channels.

name: In-Store Experience Enhancement Request
description: Submit a request to enhance the in-store experience at LuxuryCorp's retail locations, including interior design, visual merchandising, and customer service training.

name: Partnership with Emerging Designer Request
description: Request a partnership with an emerging designer or fashion talent to collaborate on a limited-edition collection or capsule line.

name: Luxury Goods Authentication Request
description: Submit a request to authenticate the authenticity of a luxury good, including verification of serial numbers, materials, and craftsmanship.

name: Employee Training and Development Request
description: Request training and development opportunities for LuxuryCorp employees, including workshops, mentorship programs, and leadership development initiatives.
